generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings and arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a pedestrian sidewalk on the right side of the image, where a person is standing, and it is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: A large, modern building with a glass dome structure is visible in the background on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible throughout the image, both in the foreground and background, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast with a white or light gray color.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the image, standing on the sidewalk, wearing a striped shirt and shorts.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the side of the road in the background.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign, a parking sign, and a "No Parking" sign, all mounted on poles.
- pole: Several poles are visible throughout the image, including those supporting traffic lights and traffic signs.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the left side of the image, near the curb.
